mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT * FROM globalbiz.MagamDate WHERE mgMonth >= #{mgMonth} GROUP BY mgMonth ORDER BY mgMonth ) AS a
SELECT mgMonth, jisaCD, mgStartDate, mgEndDate, mgEndYMD, mgJobDate, mgJobEndDate FROM globalbiz.MagamDate WHERE mgMonth >= #{mgMonth} GROUP BY mgMonth ORDER BY mgMonth
